item.title: How Long Does Adderall Stay in Your System? (Urine)
item.description: Understanding Adderall and Its Effects on the Body Understanding Adderall and its effects on the body is crucial for those who are prescribed this medication or considering its use. Adderall is a prescription stimulant drug commonly used to treat attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD), narcolepsy, and certain sleep disorders. It works by increasing the levels of certain chemicals in the brain that help with focus, attention, and behavior. However, it is important to understand how long Adderall stays in your system in order to address questions about its presence during urine drug tests.
